universAAL Support uaalDirectives-maven-plugin

universAAL Support uaalDirectives-maven-plugin
Parent Project
  • universAAL Maven Plugins
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

uaalDirectives:name-check

Full name:

org.universAAL.support:uaalDirectives-maven-plugin:3.4.1-SNAPSHOT:name-check

Description:

Checks that the groupId, artifactID, Version, and Name are compliant with the naming conventions.
These conventions are specified by defining respectively the following properties:
  • artifactIdMatchString
  • groupIdMatchString
  • versionMatchString
  • nameMatchString
These properties are defined in standard java regexp language; by default they take the value ".*" (anything) if not defined. These properties shoud be defined in parent POMs.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
failOnMissMatch boolean - When set to true with the -DfailOnMissMatch maven option; the execution will fail, instead of just stating a warning.
It is useful to run maven with the -fn option over a project aggregation, this way all non-compliant modules are listed.
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

failOnMissMatch:

When set to true with the -DfailOnMissMatch maven option; the execution will fail, instead of just stating a warning.
It is useful to run maven with the -fn option over a project aggregation, this way all non-compliant modules are listed.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${failOnMissMatch}
  • Default: false
